thread.title: Mysterious Band Megadeth Will Support On Tour Revealed: It's The Scorpions [News]
thread.title_full: Mysterious Band Megadeth Will Support On Tour Revealed: It's The Scorpions [News]

title: Mysterious Band Megadeth Will Support On Tour Revealed: It's The Scorpions [News]
text:
Posted an hour ago 6 
Blabbermouth reports that the mysterious band Megadeth will open for on upcoming fall US tour are the Scorpions. 
The report reads: "According to the Los Angeles radio station 93.1 Jack FM, Megadeth will open for German hard rock veterans Scorpions on a U.S. tour this fall. The trek will include an October 7 stop at the Forum in L.A. Tickets for that show go on sale this Friday, March 24 at 10 a.m., with a presale on Thursday using the password 'crazy.'" 
Dave Mustaine previously said about the trek: "Believe it or not, we've got some cool things going on for the States - two really great things. 
"We'll be heading out some part of the spring or summer, and then we just were told about an opportunity at the end of the year that really, really excited me. It's somebody I've never played with before that we're actually gonna be supporting. 
"They were so cool that we would step down from being a headliner to support this group."
